explains: n. 自由主义；开明的思想或见解

sentences.en: He was concerned over growing liberalism in the church.
sentences.cn: 他对教会中日益增强的自由主义倾向心存忧虑。

sentences.en: Wherein lies the difference between conservatism and liberalism?
sentences.cn: 保守主义和自由主义的区别在哪里？

sentences.en: The author doesn't equate liberalism and conservatism.
sentences.cn: 该作者没有将自由主义等同于保守主义。
